  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_93649</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_93649</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pesticide concentration in the food chain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schädlingsbekämpfungsmittelkonzentration in der
Nahrungsmittelkette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Concentration en pesticide dans la chaîne 
alimentaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Concentração do pesticide na corrente de 
alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Concentrazione nell'antiparassitario nel ciclo 
alimentare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συγκέντρωση φυτοφαρμάκων στην τροφική αλυσίδα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Concentración del pesticida en el encadenamiento 
de alimento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that animals which are higher on the food chain have more concentration of pesticide than those lower in the food chain.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">concentration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">food chain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pesticide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">toxins</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Tiere welche auf der 
Nahrungsmittelkette höher sind, mehr Konzentration des 
Schädlingsbekämpfungsmittels als jenes niedriger in der 
Nahrungsmittelkette haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les animaux ce qui 
sont plus hauts sur la chaîne alimentaire ont plus de concentration 
de pesticide que ces inférieure dans la chaîne alimentaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os animais quais 
são mais elevados na corrente de alimento têm mais concentração do
pesticide do que aquele mais baixa na corrente de alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che gli animali quale
sono più alti sul ciclo alimentare hanno più concentrazione 
dell'antiparassitario che quel più bassa nel ciclo alimentare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα ζώα που είναι 
υψηλότερα στην τροφική αλυσίδα έχουν περισσότερη συγκέντρωση του
φυτοφαρμάκου από εκείνος ο χαμηλότερη στην τροφική αλυσίδα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los animales cuáles
son más altos en el encadenamiento de alimento tienen más 
concentración del pesticida que eso más baja en el encadenamiento de
alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konzentration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrungsmittelkette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schädlingsbekämpfungsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Giftstoffe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">concentration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
